Target Besar Jokowi RI Punya Jalan Tol 5.000 Km
06 Nov 2019, 10:37 by Hendra Kusuma


Foto: Andhika Prasetia/detikcom

Jakarta - Menggenjot infrastruktur menjadi program prioritas Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi). Di periode pertama, Jokowi berhasil membangun kurang lebih 1.500 kilometer (km) jalan tol.Pada periode kedua, Jokowi kembali menargetkan pembangunan jalan tol hingga 5.000 km selama lima tahun atau sampai 2024."Alhamdulillah kita harap akhir 2019 ini, kita akan memiliki kurang lebih, berapa Pak Menteri (Menteri PUPR Basuki Hadimuljono)? 1.500 km jalan tol. Ini hanya lima tahun. Dan kita harapkan nanti lima tahun ke depan berada pada angka kurang lebih 4.500-5.000 km jalan tol kita," kata Jokowi saat membuka acara Konstruksi Indonesia dan Indonesia Infrastructure Week 2019 di JIEXPO Kemayoran, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Target besar Jokowi muncul setelah melihat China yang berhasil membangun 280.000 km jalan tol selama 40 tahun. Indonesia sejak 1978 sampai 2014 atau setelah pembangunan jalan tol Jagorawi baru bisa membangun 780 km."Jangan ada yang tepuk tangan. Kita 780 km selama 40 tahun, di China 280.000 km. Ini lah yang sering ekstrem saya bilang kita terlalu tertinggal jauh. Ini kerjaan pagi siang malam harus selesai target-target kita," jelas dia.Mantan Wali Kota Solo ini juga mengungkapkan bahwa pembangunan infrastruktur yang dibangun selama lima tahun belakangan ini telah memberikan banyak perubahan. Salah satunya peringkat pembangunan infrastruktur Indonesia berada di posisi 52 atau naik 30 peringkat di tahun 2018.Dia mencontohkan salah satu perubahan infrastruktur terjadi di Papua khususnya jalan dari Merauke sampai Boven Digoel. Menurut Mantan Wali Kota Solo ini menganggap bahwa jalan tersebut merupakan Sudirman-Thamrinnya Papua."Negara ini negara besar, bukan hanya Jawa. Kita memiliki 17.000 pulau, bukan hanya Jawa saja. Kita di Jawa mungkin nikmati mulusnya jalan. Tapi lihat provinsi lain. Misalnya di papua. Mana jalan di Papua? Ini jalan di Papua (gambar). Di merauke sampai Boven Digoel. Ini lima tahun lalu, sekarang sudah baik," tutur Jokowi. Simak Video " Menilik Jalan Tol Pertama di Kalimantan"[Gambas:Video 20detik](hek/hns)

The Great Target of Jokowi RI Has a 5,000 Km Toll Road
06 Nov 2019, 10:37 by Hendra Kusuma


Photo: Andhika Prasetia / detikcom

Jakarta - Boosting infrastructure has become a priority program for President Joko Widodo (Jokowi). In the first period, Jokowi managed to build approximately 1,500 kilometers (km) of toll roads. In the second period, Jokowi again targeted the construction of toll roads up to 5,000 km over five years or until 2024. "Thank God we hope that by the end of 2019, we will have more or less "How many Mr. Minister (PUPR Minister Basuki Hadimuljono)? 1,500 km of toll roads. This is only five years. And we hope that in the next five years we will be at approximately 4,500-5,000 km of our toll roads," Jokowi said when opening the Indonesian Construction program and Indonesia Infrastructure Week 2019 at JIEXPO Kemayoran, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Jokowi's big target comes after seeing China succeed in building 280,000 km of toll roads over 40 years. Indonesia from 1978 to 2014 or after the construction of the Jagorawi toll road was only able to build 780 km. "Don't clap. We have 780 km for 40 years, in China 280,000 km. This is often the extreme. I say we are too far behind. This is work morning and evening our targets must be completed, "he explained. The former Mayor of Solo also revealed that the construction of infrastructure built over the past five years has made many changes. One of them is the ranking of Indonesia's infrastructure development in the position of 52 or up 30 ranking in 2018. He gave an example of one of the infrastructure changes that occurred in Papua, especially the road from Merauke to Boven Digoel. According to the former mayor of Solo, this road is considered to be the Sudirman-Thamrin of Papua. "This country is a big country, not only Java. We have 17,000 islands, not just Java. We in Java may enjoy smooth roads. But look at other provinces. "In Papua, where is the road in Papua? This is the road in Papua (pictured). From the road until Boven Digoel. This is five years ago, now it's good," Jokowi said. Check out the video "Viewing the First Toll Road in Kalimantan" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (hek / hns)
